getVoiceDataFiles

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.io.File> getVoiceDataFiles()
Description copied from class: VoicePackager
Get the data files for this voice (which go into MARYBASE/lib/voices) and put them in a <property, File> Map so that they can be accessed individually by the corresponding property key, e.g. "WaveTimelineMaker.waveTimeline" → File("VOICE_DIR/mary/timeline_waves.mry")

TODO The way individual components provide access to their properties is a little patchy, so for now, this method is a little fragile!

Overrides:
getVoiceDataFiles in class VoicePackager
Returns:
the file Map
